description:
8GB MP3 Player
    Movies: Music & Photos
    EZ MP3 Transfer from Windows media player & iTunes
    Superior Sound & Rich Bass
    Up to 50 hours of music playback
    Up to 10 hours of video playback
    FM tuner allows users to enjoy their favorite radio stations
    Media Go application allows for easy and quick syncing
    Built-in microphone allows for voice recording
    USB rechargeable for recharging from any desktop or laptop with USB out
    1.77" LCD display offers detail and richness for viewing photos, video, and album art
    Packed with Sony proprietary technologies for enhanced digital conversion
    Includes capacity for 5 playlists
    Allows users to add synchronized lyrics that scroll along with the music
    Lightweight stereo in-ear headphones/ear buds (Included)
    Main Color: Black
title: Sony Walkman NWZE374/BC 8GB MP3 Player Black
